text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG GL504GS-DS74 Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Slim Bezel Display, GTX 1070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, 16 GB DDR4!

The ASUS ROG GL504GS-DS74 Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Slim Bezel Display, GTX 1070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, 16 GB DDR4 does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ASUS ROG GL504GS-DS74 Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Slim Bezel Display, GTX 1070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, 16 GB DDR4 is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the ASUS ROG GL504GS-DS74 Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Slim Bezel Display, GTX 1070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, 16 GB DDR4 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the ASUS ROG GL504GS-DS74 Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Slim Bezel Display, GTX 1070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, 16 GB DDR4 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
